Reviews.Title: “Quite a nice little find”
Reviews.Author: mozart15
Reviews.Content: booked people hotel potsdamer strasse isnt street se bus front stops directly brandenberg gate location short 10 minute walk directly potsdamer platz main train station nice clean 3rd floor elevator fine hostess lovely friendly breakfast typical european style liked overall low cost stay gem

HotelInfo.Name: Villa Amadeus Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Potsdamer Strasse 91, 10785 Berlin, Germany
